name: Tall Tales Blanj 3
description:
~ CONTROLS ~

  • Z - Jump
  • X - Shoot stars (if you have any)
  • C - Run
  • Up key - Interact/Shoot up when you learn it
  • Down key - Hold for super jump

If the game gives you a password, use it and you can continue your game from that point.

I redid the original ones on my school acc because they were too cringeworthy and unoriginal and bad, So I made a good TTB 3 that I put my blood, sweat, tears, and some organs into. I strongly apologize for the original 3 (2 episodes).

~Story~

After dealing with Fear Factory, Blanj then finds his way home. He was so exhausted after what he has been through. Hoping he would get a good night's sleep, he instead had a nightmare. In his dream he woke up in a castle owned by a mischievous figure named Tricksta. He seems to be very passionate about getting his first kill on somebody. Thankfully you are then saved by a pillow named Pearl. She helps you to a portal which will help Blanj wake up from this dream. Can Blanj make his way to the portal and not die from his own dream? Play the game to find out!

~Main Characters~

-Blanj - A blue burger-blob that came to this mysterious world through a dream.

-Pearl - A pillow who is kind and helpful.

-Tricksta - A shadow man with a thousand tricks and pranks up his sleeve, he wants Blanj killed so he can escape the dream world.

~Bosses~

-Ballistic

-Cyclops Man

-Drill Ant

-Tricksta

Pls consider... Following me on Twitter and Following me on NewGrounds
